attorneys.attorney_name: U S Attorney CR Criminal Division

charges.charge_description: 18:924C; use and carrying of a firearm during the commisssion of a crime of violence (10)

charges.charge_disposition: Counts 1, 3, 5, 7, 9, 11-custody of the Bureau of Prisons for a term of 188 months concurrently; Count 2-60 months consecutive; Counts 4, 6, 8, 10 and 12-240 months consecutive to all other counts; spv release for 3 years concurrent as to all counts; (total of 120 years in custody); std/addtnl conditions; penalty assessment of $50.00 as to each count for a total of $600.00; no fine; restitution ordered in the amt of $107,063 to be paid forthwith; dft advised of his appeal rights (10)
